name: Gameboy Game Made By Me
description:
To play this game you will need to have a Gameboy emulator installed the run the game.

Personally i use this one:

http://www.emulator-zone.com/doc.php/gba/vboyadvance.html

The controls will be what your emulators controls are set too, I suggest using wasd.

To push the character around that isn't yours press the button which emulates A (in you emulator settings again).

Every 30 Seconds the NPC moves back to the middle just i case you get it stuck i a corner. You can also got in the door way in the bottom of the screen you send the NPC to the middle of the screen.
